name: Hard Taco Shells
author: TINKERBELL4
summary: Home made crunchy taco shells are excellent! Use home made tortillas, or corn tortillas from the store.
directions: Heat about 1 inch of oil in a heavy skillet over medium to medium-high heat to 365 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Use tongs to place one tortilla at a time into the oil
It should start to sizzle right away
Cook for about 15 seconds, then flip over and fold the shell in half, holding in place with the tongs until crispy, about 15 seconds
You may need a little practice at first
Drain on paper towels, and sprinkle with salt while still hot
Use for tacos right away, or they may become chewy
Leftovers may be heated in the oven for crisping
